parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sensors

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets that the vehicle will be able to receive targets acquired by someone else via datalink from the [[Side]] center.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''setVehicleReceiveRemoteTargets''' bool

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> bool: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>([[vehicle]] [[player]]) [[setVehicleReceiveRemoteTargets]] true;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setVehicleRadar]], [[vehicleReportRemoteTargets]], [[setVehicleReportRemoteTargets]], [[vehicleReceiveRemoteTargets]], [[vehicleReportOwnPosition]], [[setVehicleReportOwnPosition]], [[reportRemoteTarget]], [[confirmSensorTarget]]
</value></part></template>
